verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the Sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> (or Tiberias <S%G5085><s%>).

And a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was following <S%G190><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> they were seeing <S%G3708><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He was performing <S%G4160><s%> on those <S%G3588><s%> who were sick. <S%G770><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G424><s%> up on the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> He sat <S%G2521><s%> with His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> was at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> lifting <S%G1869><s%> up His eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and seeing <S%G2300><s%> that a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him, said <S%G3004><s%> to Philip, <S%G5376><s%> "Where <S%G4159><s%> are we to buy <S%G59><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> may eat <S%G2068><s%>?"
And this <S%G3778><s%> He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to test <S%G3985><s%> him; for He Himself <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> He was intending <S%G3195><s%> to do. <S%G4160><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "Two <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> denarii <S%G1220><s%> worth of bread <S%G740><s%> is not sufficient <S%G714><s%> for them, for everyone <S%G1538><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> a little. <S%G1024><s%>"
One <S%G1520><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter's brother, <S%G80><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him,

"There is a lad <S%G3808><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G3795><s%> but what <S%G5101><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> for so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> people <S%G5118><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Have <S%G4160><s%> the people <S%G444><s%> sit <S%G377><s%> down. <S%G377><s%>" Now <S%G1161><s%> there was much <S%G4183><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> in the place. <S%G5117><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> sat <S%G377><s%> down, <S%G377><s%> in number <S%G706><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand. <S%G4000><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the loaves; <S%G740><s%> and having given <S%G2168><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> He distributed <S%G1239><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who were seated; <S%G345><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the fish <S%G3795><s%> as much <S%G3745><s%> as they wanted. <S%G2309><s%>

And when <S%G5613><s%> they were filled, <S%G1705><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Gather <S%G4863><s%> up the leftover <S%G4052><s%> fragments <S%G2801><s%> that nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> may be lost. <S%G622><s%>"

And so <S%G3767><s%> they gathered <S%G4863><s%> them up, and filled <S%G1072><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> with fragments <S%G2801><s%> from the five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were left <S%G4052><s%> over <S%G4052><s%> by those <S%G3588><s%> who had eaten. <S%G977><s%>

When therefore <S%G3767><s%> the people <S%G444><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He had performed, <S%G4160><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is of a truth <S%G230><s%> the Prophet <S%G4396><s%> who is to come <S%G2064><s%> into the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> perceiving <S%G1097><s%> that they were intending <S%G3195><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> and take <S%G726><s%> Him by force, <S%G726><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> Him king, <S%G935><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the mountain <S%G3735><s%> by Himself <S%G846><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

and after getting <S%G1684><s%> into a boat, <S%G4143><s%> they [started to] cross <S%G4008><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> to Capernaum. <S%G2746><s%> And it had already <S%G2235><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to them.
And the sea <S%G2281><s%> [began] to be stirred <S%G1326><s%> up because a strong <S%G3173><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> was blowing. <S%G4154><s%>

When therefore <S%G3767><s%> they had rowed <S%G1643><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> three <S%G1501><s%> <S%G4002><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> four miles, <S%G4712><s%> they beheld <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and drawing <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the boat; <S%G4143><s%> and they were frightened. <S%G5399><s%>
But He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "It is I; do not be afraid. <S%G5399><s%>"

They were willing <S%G2309><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> Him into the boat; <S%G4143><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was at the land <S%G1093><s%> to which <S%G3739><s%> they were going. <S%G5217><s%>

The next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> that stood <S%G2476><s%> on the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that there was no <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> small <S%G4142><s%> boat <S%G4142><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> and that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had not entered <S%G4897><s%> with His disciples <S%G3101><s%> into the boat, <S%G4143><s%> but [that] His disciples <S%G3101><s%> had gone <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

There came <S%G2064><s%> other <S%G243><s%> small <S%G4142><s%> boats <S%G4142><s%> from Tiberias <S%G5085><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they ate <S%G2068><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> after the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had given <S%G2168><s%> thanks. <S%G2168><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not there, <S%G1563><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> they themselves <S%G846><s%> got <S%G1684><s%> into the small <S%G4142><s%> boats, <S%G4142><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And when they found <S%G2147><s%> Him on the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> did You get <S%G1096><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, you seek <S%G2212><s%> Me, not because <S%G3754><s%> you saw <S%G3708><s%> signs, <S%G4592><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> you ate <S%G2068><s%> of the loaves, <S%G740><s%> and were filled. <S%G5526><s%>

"Do not work <S%G2038><s%> for the food <S%G1035><s%> which perishes, <S%G622><s%> but for the food <S%G1035><s%> which endures <S%G3306><s%> to eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> to you, for on Him the Father, <S%G3962><s%> [even] God, <S%G2316><s%> has set <S%G4972><s%> His seal. <S%G4972><s%>"
They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to Him, "What <S%G5101><s%> shall we do, <S%G4160><s%> that we may work <S%G2038><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "This <S%G3778><s%> is the work <S%G2041><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him whom <S%G3739><s%> He has sent. <S%G649><s%>"

They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to Him, "What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> do You do <S%G4160><s%> for a sign, <S%G4592><s%> that we may see, <S%G3708><s%> and believe <S%G4100><s%> You? What <S%G5101><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> do You perform <S%G2038><s%>?

"Our fathers <S%G3962><s%> ate <S%G2068><s%> the manna <S%G3131><s%> in the wilderness; <S%G2048><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'He gave <S%G1325><s%> them bread <S%G740><s%> out of heaven <S%G3772><s%> to eat. <S%G2068><s%>'"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, it is not Moses <S%G3475><s%> who has given <S%G1325><s%> you the bread <S%G740><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but it is My Father <S%G3962><s%> who gives <S%G1325><s%> you the true <S%G228><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> out of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"For the bread <S%G740><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is that which comes <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and gives <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>"
They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> evermore <S%G3842><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> us this <S%G3778><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> he who comes <S%G2064><s%> to Me shall not hunger, <S%G3983><s%> and he who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> thirst. <S%G1372><s%>
"But I said <S%G3004><s%> to you, that you have seen <S%G3708><s%> Me, and yet do not believe. <S%G4100><s%>

"All <S%G3956><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> Me shall come <S%G2240><s%> to Me, and the one who comes <S%G2064><s%> to Me I will certainly <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> not cast <S%G1544><s%> out.

"For I have come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> not to do <S%G4160><s%> My own <S%G1699><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but the will <S%G2307><s%> of Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.

"And this <S%G3778><s%> is the will <S%G2307><s%> of Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me, that of all <S%G3956><s%> that He has given <S%G1325><s%> Me I lose <S%G622><s%> nothing, <S%G3361><s%> but raise <S%G450><s%> it up on the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

"For this <S%G3778><s%> is the will <S%G2307><s%> of My Father, <S%G3962><s%> that everyone <S%G3956><s%> who beholds <S%G2334><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> in Him, may have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and I Myself <S%G1473><s%> will raise <S%G450><s%> him up on the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> were grumbling <S%G1111><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> that came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>"

And they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is not this <S%G3778><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and mother <S%G3384><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%>? How <S%G4459><s%> does He now <S%G3568><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> 'I have come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven <S%G3772><s%>' ?"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do not grumble <S%G1111><s%> among <S%G3326><s%> yourselves. <S%G240><s%>

"No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to Me, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me draws <S%G1670><s%> him; and I will raise <S%G450><s%> him up on the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

"It is written <S%G1125><s%> in the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> 'And they shall all <S%G3956><s%> be taught <S%G1318><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>' Everyone <S%G3956><s%> who has heard <S%G191><s%> and learned <S%G3129><s%> from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to Me.

"Not that any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the One who is from God; <S%G2316><s%> He has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, he who believes <S%G4100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
"I am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
"Your fathers <S%G3962><s%> ate <S%G2068><s%> the manna <S%G3131><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and they died. <S%G599><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the bread <S%G740><s%> which comes <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that one <S%G5100><s%> may eat <S%G2068><s%> of it and not die. <S%G599><s%>

"I am <S%G1510><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> that came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> he shall live <S%G2198><s%> forever; <S%G165><s%> and the bread <S%G740><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I shall give <S%G1325><s%> for the life <S%G2222><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> is My flesh. <S%G4561><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> [began] to argue <S%G3164><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> us [His] flesh <S%G4561><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you eat <S%G2068><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> His blood, <S%G129><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

"He who eats <S%G5176><s%> My flesh <S%G4561><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> My blood <S%G129><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and I will raise <S%G450><s%> him up on the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>
"For My flesh <S%G4561><s%> is true <S%G227><s%> food, <S%G1035><s%> and My blood <S%G129><s%> is true <S%G227><s%> drink. <S%G4213><s%>
"He who eats <S%G5176><s%> My flesh <S%G4561><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> My blood <S%G129><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> in Me, and I in him.

"As the living <S%G2198><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> Me, and I live <S%G2198><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> he who eats <S%G5176><s%> Me, he also <S%G2548><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of Me.

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> not as the fathers <S%G3962><s%> ate, <S%G2068><s%> and died, <S%G599><s%> he who eats <S%G5176><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>"
These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> in the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> as He taught <S%G1321><s%> in Capernaum. <S%G2746><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> [this <S%G3778><s%>] said, <S%G3004><s%> "This is a difficult <S%G4642><s%> statement; <S%G3056><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> listen <S%G191><s%> to it?"
